 * @file    SPI/SEL_Software/readme.txt
 * @version V1.00
 * @date    2014-06-30
 * @brief   Description of the SPI SEL software control example.
Example Description:

This example describes how to configure SPI transmission by SEL software control.

Transmission behavior implies as following:

This example configures Master as master and Slave as slave, remember to set SEL as output mode for slave select. Both SPIs are configured with 8 bits mode, non-FIFO mode, (PCLK_SPI/4) transmission speed.

Notice setting SEL output as active to select slave Slave before transmission begins, Master starts to send data from SPI0_Buffer_Tx and receives data to SPI0_Buffer_Rx one by one. The same behavior slave Slave does simultaneously, Transmission and Receiving by polling, This example will end after 4 data are sent and received for each SPI, program will compare the received data to the transferred data to check on data validation.

Directory Contents:
  • SPI/SEL_Software/main.c Main program
  • SPI/SEL_Software/ht32fxxxx_it.c Interrupt handlers
Hardware and Software Environment:
  • Remember to connect Master to Slave respectively. Refer "ht32_board_config.h" for pin assignment.
  • This example shows the result by LED1 and LED2.
  • This example can be run on HT32 Series development board.
